ygData.subject: More on Hate lists
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, last night I kept getting added to the hate list of every Drachnid in Firiona Vie, leading to some fairly epic collections of targets for my AE songs :o)
ygData.messageBody:
Well, last night I kept getting added to the hate list of every Drachnid in
Firiona Vie, leading to some fairly epic collections of targets for my AE
songs :o) . I thought pixie strike might be to blame but I stopped using it
and zoned and still was voted most popular among the Arachnid set. The night
before it was Giants in the Frontier mountains, I was "pulling" everything
if I came off the hill to the flat before the castle. Now, *there* I was
using both pixie strike and Song of the Sirens. Something really really
stinky is up with bards and hate lists, it's gettiing ugly out there.

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 34, Povar
